title: Favorite Foods?
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Ah, look at this, Rina-san. What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Scallop flavor...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Do you think Hanpen-san will like it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I love it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh, there’s also a chicken tender flavor. Tuna, bonito... Even something called “Tuna & Pumpkin.” This is...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>So hard to choose from... Rina-chan Board says, “Woozy.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Indeed... Is there something Hanpen-san particularly likes?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Particularly...? I don’t know. Hanpen seems to enjoy eating anything.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>...Could it be that anything you give her becomes one of her favorite foods? After all, Hanpen-san is very attached to you, Rina-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If that’s true, I’d be very happy, but it’s such a big responsibility... I need to think more about which snack would make Hanpen the happiest...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hehe. I’ll stay with you until you decide. Let’s think carefully!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
